### Plots

#### Raw Read Counts
The read counts in each sample.

```{r readCounts, echo=FALSE}
if("FGCZ_PLATE_NO." %in% colnames(dataset)){
  dataset <- dataset[order(dataset[['FGCZ_PLATE_NO.']], dataset[['Read Count']]),]
  readCount <- dataset[['Read Count']]/10^3
  names(readCount) <- paste(dataset[['FGCZ_PLATE_NO.']], dataset[['Name']], sep = '_')
} else {
  dataset <- dataset[order(dataset[['Read Count']]),]
  readCount <- dataset[['Read Count']]/10^3
  names(readCount) <- dataset[['Name']]
}
```

The read counts per Plate

```{r readCountsPerPlatePlotly, fig.height=7, fig.width=min(max(7, 7+(length(readCount)-20)*0.3), 30), echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
if("FGCZ_PLATE_NO." %in% colnames(dataset)){
  m <- list(
    l = 80,
    r = 80,
    b = 200,
    t = 100,
    pad = 0
  )
  readCountPerPlate <- tapply(readCount, INDEX = dataset[['FGCZ_PLATE_NO.']], sum)/10^3
  names(readCountPerPlate) <- unique(dataset[['FGCZ_PLATE_NO.']])
  
  plot_ly(x=names(readCountPerPlate), y=readCountPerPlate, type="bar") %>%
    layout(title="Total reads",
           yaxis = list(title = "Counts [M]"),
           margin = m
    )
}
```


```{r readCountsPlotly, fig.height=7, fig.width=min(max(7, 7+(length(readCount)-20)*0.3), 30), echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
m <- list(
  l = 80,
  r = 80,
  b = 200,
  t = 100,
  pad = 0
)
plot_ly(x=names(readCount), y=readCount, type="bar") %>%
  layout(title="Total reads",
         yaxis = list(title = "Counts [K]"),
         margin = m
  )
```
#### Mapping Rate

```{r mappingRate, echo=FALSE}
if("FGCZ_PLATE_NO." %in% colnames(result)){
  result2 <- result[order(result[['FGCZ_PLATE_NO.']], result[['Read Count']]),]
  result2[['Name']] <- paste(result2[['FGCZ_PLATE_NO.']], result2[['Name']], sep = '_')
  } else {
  result2 <- result[order(result[['Read Count']]),] 
  }
  mappingRate <- result2$mappingRate
  names(mappingRate) <- result2[['Name']]
```

```{r mappingsPlotly, fig.height=7, fig.width=min(max(7, 7+(length(readCount)-20)*0.3), 30), echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
m <- list(
  l = 80,
  r = 80,
  b = 200,
  t = 100,
  pad = 0
)
plot_ly(x=names(mappingRate), y=mappingRate, type="bar") %>%
  layout(title="Mapping Rate",
         yaxis = list(title = "in %"),
         margin = m
  )
```

